div.data-title: SREC Bangalore Chapter Annual Alumni Meet 2014
div.data-desc: Inauguration dance by M.S.Natyalya Students for SREC Alumni Meet - Bangalore Chapter.
div.h3: SREC Bangalore Chapter Annual Alumni Meet 2014
div.div: Date: October 11, 2014 Organizer: Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College, Coimbatore
Venue: Confident Cascade Resorts, Bannerghata road,Bangalore
div.h4: Inauguration dance by M.S.Natyalya Students for SREC Alumni Meet - Bangalore Chapter.

div.data-desc: Celebration of M.S.Natyalaya's second anniversary with a themed - Mukund Leela, dance dedicated to the occasion.
div.div: Presided By: (1) Mr.Prabhakar K.S. I.A.S, (2) Kalaimamani Mr.S. Kumar-Artiste and Organizer of Bhagavata Mela, Melattur (3)Mr. Ramesh and Mrs.Pushkala Ramesh-Director, Bharatakala Academy, Srirangam
Theme dance of the event: Mukund Leela

img.alt: Chief Guest - Mr. Prabhakar I.A.S(Special Officer to CM, Karnataka) inaugurating the function.
img.title: Chief Guest - Mr. Prabhakar I.A.S(Special Officer to CM, Karnataka) inaugurating the function.

img.alt: Chief Guests - Mr. Kalaimamani Kumar, Mr. Prabhakar, Natanamamani Mrs. Pushkala Ramesh lighting candles with Mrs. Kousalya Nivas(Guru, M.S.Natyalaya) and Mr.Nivas(Chairman and Managing Trustee).
img.title: Chief Guests - Mr. Kalaimamani Kumar, Mr. Prabhakar, Natanamamani Mrs. Pushkala Ramesh lighting candles with Mrs. Kousalya Nivas(Guru, M.S.Natyalaya) and Mr.Nivas(Chairman and Managing Trustee).

img.alt: Chief guest Mr. Prabhakar distributing momento to students.
img.title: Chief guest Mr. Prabhakar distributing momento to students.

img.alt: Mukund Leela performance by Kousalya Nivas - the theme picked for the occasion
img.title: Mukund Leela performance by Kousalya Nivas - the theme picked for the occasion

img.title: Mukund Leela - group performance by M.S.Natyalaya students
